# frame

**Instance Property**

The geometric frame of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var frame: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The item’s frame must be expressed in the coordinate space of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusItemContainer] that contains it.
title: frame
